utilMDE
Class StringBuilderDelimited

java.lang.Object
  utilMDE.StringBuilderDelimited
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.CharSequence
public class StringBuilderDelimited
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.CharSequence

Like StringBuilder, but adds a delimiter between each pair of strings that are insered into the Stringbuilder. This can simplify the logic of programs and also avoid errors. Does not extend StringBuilder because that would probably break, due to the possibility of calling the wrong version of append. Also, I don't (yet) want to override all the methods; this simpler version seems sufficient for the time being.
